nodes.bodyText: Looking into it, we don't seem to ever fire UpdateTabPanelsEvent so I think we should get rid of this handler and the event.

I know you didn't write the original code, but do you know why the comparisons between windows A & B are compared with && as opposed to ||? It seems like as long as one is different we want to do the replace.

You added that comparison in this commit:
1136759
Wow ok, I think this is a bug and should be changed.
Per discussion I have removed that comparison completely. Thanks!
